channel.title: jClickRs
channel.description:
decided to start up on this again, rewrote everything starting with a new ui / ideas. decided to scrap a few 'skills' and make my own 'click' game (seeing as they keep getting more and more frequent)
[spoiler=Old Topic]well. i was bored the last few days
so yeah
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzBCKa7MbpE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YebN5S0jGNg&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
rate/hate/comment/ideas/flame/idfc[/spoiler]

item.title: jClickRs
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:35, topic:519682”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=638177.msg4312769#msg4312769 date=1370994314]

[quote author=Ambokile link=topic=638177.msg4310735#msg4310735 date=1370707261]

Very nice job Vain. Why does the inventory flash when equipping an item?
[/quote]because the way i did it, i redrew the canvas upon any clicking/code executed.

that’s why i need to rewrite it.

Ah, I see. Nice job nonetheless and good luck with it. What do you plan to do for the main game screen?
[/quote]what do you mean by the main game screen?

the login screen? prelogin? post login?

The main screen where the 3d world is rendered[/quote]i plan to keep the gameframe, just like the client is. though the display of game content will be slightly similar to rsc; but it will all be 2d. (probably wont go through any map loading, just drawing trees/object etc that will be able to be interacted with)

Read full topic

item.title: jClickRs
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:26, topic:519682”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=638177.msg4310311#msg4310311 date=1370641640]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=638177.msg4310308#msg4310308 date=1370641415]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=638177.msg4310094#msg4310094 date=1370613473]
Good job, I like this. Even though I hate the thought of using HTML5 and web-sided code for something like this (mainly the HTML5, JavaScript, & PHP), I do like, however, that it’s unique. Good job, and good luck.
[/quote]Web-sided code is the future. I don’t like PHP but everything else is great.
[/quote]so far the only thing being handled in php is the map.
[/quote]Still doesn’t need to be.[/quote]i didn’t choose to handle it in php over js because of ‘superiority’ only because my knowledge allowed me to achieve it through php.

my code could probably be improved 2000x but this isn’t to achieve my goal efficiently, but to get it done.

Read full topic

havent worked on it much lately due to vacationing / jobhunting. but i added inventory item support + item equipping (need to define which items can be equipped/where it is equipped to)

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558671.msg4085594.html#msg4085594

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=638177.msg4301362#msg4301362 date=1369062601]
Actually looks alright, good job so far.
[/quote]thank you very much.[/quote]

Nice, well good luck. If you ever want to PM me to figure out more about the path I was going with a project like this, let me know.
